rows.label: qst202406_0010
rows.name:
This is terrible, mo! Terrible,
mo! The Tirkin are attacking, mo!

rows.label: qst202406_0020
rows.name: The Tirkin?

rows.label: qst202406_0030
rows.name: Are they really attacking?

rows.label: qst202406_0040
rows.name:
A big wooden box arrived on
the deck, and they all came
swarming out of it, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0050
rows.name:
This unprecedented situation
has thrown all of Goldmund
into chaos, mo!

rows.label: qst202406_0060
rows.name:
Hey, hey, Nora. What's
for dinner tonight?

rows.label: qst202406_0070
rows.name: How would Tora know, mo?

rows.label: qst202406_0080
rows.name:
I'm in the mood for some
Stuffed Meaty Paprika.

rows.label: qst202406_0090
rows.name: That's quite a delicacy, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0100
rows.name:
Right? It's my dream
to eat my fill of it.

rows.label: qst202406_0110
rows.name:
Hey you two, this isn't the
time for such a carefree chat.

rows.label: qst202406_0120
rows.name: This is no joke, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0130
rows.name:
If they rampage in Goldmund,
it'll be bad for business, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0140
rows.name: This is no time to be saying that, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0150
rows.name:
They're sure to come here
too, mo. It's dangerous,
so please run away, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0160
rows.name: You foolish Nopon.

rows.label: qst202406_0170
rows.name:
If a merchant abandons their shop,
they can't survive, mo. I will
absolutely not evacuate, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0180
rows.name:
This is happening because
you all are too weak to
drive away the Tirkin, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0190
rows.name:
This is happening because
you are all too weak to
drive away the Tirkin, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0200
rows.name:
Please think of how your
Drivers feel, having to
clean up your mess, mo!

rows.label: qst202406_0210
rows.name: It seems it's our turn to act...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202406_0220
rows.name:
Besides, the Tirkin must have
come to get revenge on you, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0230
rows.name:
Especially you, bird-brain.
Take responsibility, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0240
rows.name: Huh? Is that so?

rows.label: qst202406_0250
rows.name:
Hmm, I don't remember at all,
so maybe it is our fault.

rows.label: qst202406_0260
rows.name: No, no, it's definitely not our fault.

rows.label: qst202406_0270
rows.name:
But the damage will only spread
if we just stand here talking.

rows.label: qst202406_0280
rows.name: We have no choice but to go.

rows.label: qst202406_0290
rows.name: That's what I like to hear, mo.

rows.label: qst202406_0300
rows.name:
Let's go, Ibuki. We have to
drive away the Tirkin and
save everyone on this ship.

rows.label: qst202406_0310
rows.name: Ugh, what a pain. This feels so unfair.
